talents.name: Adrenaline rush
talents.effects: Immediately heal up to 2 lvl 1 wounds.

talents.name: Fast learner
talents.effects: When resolving cumulative checks to learn or gain information, add 1 success to the final tally of results.

talents.name: Levitation
talents.effects: You can hover above solid ground.

talents.name: Loot goblin
talents.effects: When you obtain a special or rare item, gain 3 temporary boons. They last until they are used and can be used in any combination.

talents.name: Pirates reputation
talents.effects: Choose a striking physical feature like an eyepatch, scars or tattoos. Brandish your chosen feature to immediately gather interest and attention, putting all eyes on you.

talents.name: Skill mastery
talents.effects: Choose a skill. You gain +1 to all checks made with that skill.

talents.name: Spidersense
talents.effects: You gain a sense of danger. When you use this talent, the GM will tell you about potential incoming danger, but not of its nature.

talents.name: Thick hide
talents.effects: Gain 1 armor that regenerates during a rest.

talents.name: Tremorsense
talents.effects: You sense vibrations in the earth and do not need your eyes to see, as long as your feet touch the ground.

talents.name: Unending
talents.effects: If you would die, don't.

talents.name: Vitality plus
talents.effects: You gain another lvl 1 wound permanently.

talents.name: Armor shred
talents.effects: Skirmish checks against armored targets are more effective G{and destroy your targets armor}.

talents.name: Backstab
talents.effects: You are especially deadly when your enemy does not see you coming. Treat skirmish checks that target unsuspecting opponents as one stage better.

talents.name: Battle focus
talents.effects: While you are in battle gain a temporary boon: skirmish. Also gain +1 resolve that can only be used as long as you are in that fight.

talents.name: Bloodbath
talents.effects: Bathe in blood to gain 1 temporary empty lvl 1 wound that disappears when it is filled.

talents.name: Bring it on
talents.effects: While you are outnumbered, gain a temporary boon: skirmish.

talents.name: Careless fighting
talents.effects: Gain a temporary boon x2 for your next skirmish check but gain a lvl 1 wound from an enemies attack.

talents.name: Charge with me
talents.effects: If you enter battle first and ahead of your allies, they gain a temporary boon during battle: skirmish.

talents.name: Constrictor
talents.effects: Treat checks made to grapple and restrict others as one stage better.

talents.name: Critical attacks
talents.effects: Your skirmish checks critically succeed on a 13 or higher instead of 16.

talents.name: Dual wield
talents.prerequisites: light or medium weapons boon or similar
talents.effects: You can use two weapons at the same time, gaining both of their effects with one check.

talents.name: Ethereal attacks
talents.effects: Your attacks can hit ethereal beings, like ghosts, wraiths, etc.

talents.name: Fair fight
talents.effects: Choose a single enemy. You both enter a duel that can not be interrupted until one of you dies or surrenders.

talents.name: Flexible armor
talents.effects: Flaws gained from wearing armor do not affect your agility and trickery.

talents.name: From the shadows
talents.effects: Attacking someone out of the shadows does not reveal you. Works only once per target in a given situation.

talents.name: Get down!
talents.effects: When an ally besides you gains a wound, roll an endurance check to take G{a wound of a lvl lower} | Y{the wound} | R{take a wound of a higher lvl} instead.

talents.name: Instill fear
talents.effects: When you kill or harm an enemy, roll an influence check: Remaining enemies will G{try to flee} | Y{be terrified of you} | R{lose morale}.

talents.name: Lust for revenge
talents.effects: After you take damage, if you manage to kill the source to remove the wound.

talents.name: Mark for death
talents.effects: After you deal damage to an enemy you can mark them. An ally or yourself can consume the mark to recover 1 resolve when killing them.

talents.name: Power through
talents.effects: When you take any wound, you can ignore it. Instead only gain the flaws of the injury. You can remove them during a rest instead of treating wounds.

talents.name: Reactionary resistance
talents.effects: When you gain a wound inflicted by a certain type of damage, you gain 1 armor against that type of damage.

talents.name: Recovery
talents.effects: When you use a piece of ammunition you can spend a charge of this talent instead of losing ammo and reloading.

talents.name: Revel in pain
talents.effects: When you kill an enemy, gain another action instantly.

talents.name: Strongarm
talents.effects: You can wield heavy weapons with only one hand.

talents.name: Suave fighting
talents.effects: You can choose to use influence instead of skirmish for your checks during combat.

talents.name: Sword and powder
talents.prerequisites: any melee weapon boon, firearm boon
talents.effects: When you make a skirmish check to attack with your melee weapon, you can also attack a target with your firearm.

talents.name: Ultra heavy
talents.effects: You can use heavy objects like trees, anchors or boulders as heavy weapons. Boons do not apply when using them.

talents.name: General training
talents.effects: Choose a general tag (light, medium, heavy, long, ranged, firearms or unarmed). Gain a boon of that tag.

talents.name: Weapons specialist
talents.effects: Choose a specialized tag and gain a boon of that tag.

talents.name: Arcane bond
talents.effects: You gain the ability to create arcane effects. Choose an element talent and a form talent when you learn this talent and learn them as well.

talents.name: Arcane element: fire
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: fire.

talents.name: Arcane element: water
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: water.

talents.name: Arcane element: air
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: air.

talents.name: Arcane element: earth
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: earth.

talents.name: Arcane element: essence
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: essence.

talents.name: Arcane element: light
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: light.

talents.name: Arcane element: mind
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: mind.

talents.name: Arcane element: time
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: time.

talents.name: Arcane element: space
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: space.

talents.name: Arcane element: life
talents.effects: You gain control over the arcane element: life.

talents.name: Arcane form: creation
talents.effects: You gain access over the arcane form: creation.

talents.name: Arcane form: destruction
talents.effects: You gain access over the arcane form: destruction.

talents.name: Arcane form: exploration
talents.effects: You gain access over the arcane form: exploration.

talents.name: Arcane form: mutation
talents.effects: You gain access over the arcane form: mutation.

talents.name: Arcane form: control
talents.effects: You gain access over the arcane form: control.

talents.name: Arcane rituals
talents.effects: Instead of spontaneous effects, you can perform rituals to create your arcane effects. This takes time and resources but you do not need to spend arcane threads and you can skip the arcane check to control the spell.

talents.name: Command
talents.effects: Give an ally a command. They gain a boon to follow that command. The boon lasts until used in a check or until a minute has passed.

talents.name: Honest exchange
talents.effects: You may ask a person any question and they answer truthfully. After that the person asks you a question and you have to answer truthfully. If you lie, you can never use this talent on the person again.

talents.name: Identity theft
talents.effects: You create a copy of a persons identity, including any documents used to prove your identity. This talent does not recharge normally on a rest, but instead after a week in the same city or town.

talents.name: Impostor
talents.effects: Your disguises are so good, that whenever you disguise yourself, skip the first two checks to determine whether you fool bystanders and your targets.

talents.name: In plain sight
talents.effects: You become so unobtrusive and nondescript, that only those who specifically search for you, can find you. Any person that witnesses you, will forget you after a short while unless you interact directly with them for a longer period of time.

talents.name: Lasting impression
talents.effects: After interacting with a person for a short time, gain a boon for that person. You can only have one of these boons active at once.

talents.name: Motivational speaker
talents.effects: You inspire and motivate your allies. Give your allies 1 resolve per resolve spent.

talents.name: Parley
talents.effects: You force a creature to parley with you, even if they are hostile or otherwise would not talk to you.

talents.name: Silver tongue
talents.effects: When haggling, roll 2d12 and use the result in place of silver coins.

talents.name: Ventriloquist
talents.effects: You can create sounds without moving your lips and make it seem like they originate from any point around you.

talents.name: Breaking affront
talents.effects: Roll an influence check against a target to confuse it and G{gain a temporary boon x3 against them that lasts an hour} | G{break their concentration and stun them} | Y{gain a temporary boon x2 against them that lasts a minute} | R{gain a temporary boon against them that lasts a few seconds}.

talents.name: Challenge
talents.effects: Roll an influence check to challenge enemies around you: G{You are focused and gain +1 resolve} | Y{You are focused} | R{You are focused, but take a lvl 1 wound}.

talents.name: Compulsive liar
talents.effects: When you roll a successful influence check to lie you gain a stacking boon: lying. The boon is lost when you use an influence check to tell the truth.

talents.name: Creative threats
talents.effects: When you roll influence checks to intimidate someone, you may make a second check, using a skill based on your threats and intimidation tactics and use either result.

talents.name: Death glare
talents.effects: Roll an influence check against a single target to stare them down: G{The target falls unconscious} | Y{The target tries to escape from you} | R{The target attacks you in rage}.

talents.name: Deja vu
talents.effects: Roll an influence check to force a creature to repeat their last move G{exactly the same, regardless of the circumstances} | Y{roughly the same, based on the current situation} | R{roughly the same, but at any time}.

talents.name: Foulmouth
talents.effects: Roll an influence or performance check in front of a crowd, the audience is disgusted by your words and stops what they were doing G{until you leave} | Y{for a few moments} | R{momentarily}

talents.name: Network
talents.effects: Roll a influence check to set up a secret meeting with a contact: The contact will be  G{trustworthy} | Y{dubious} | R{fraudulent}.

talents.name: Upsell
talents.effects: Roll a trickery or influence check to try and sell an item for a higher price: G{You double the price} | Y{You increase the price by half}. After you used this talent, increase the target for subsequent checks at that merchant by 1/2.

talents.name: Yarnspinning
talents.effects: Roll a influence check to captivate an audience with tall tales of your exploits: G{The audience believes you and will tell others about you} | Y{The audience believes you} | R{The audience listens to you but is not fully convinced}.

talents.name: Arcane affinity
talents.effects: Roll an insight check to check your surroundings for traces of arcane magic: G{You learn details of the magic around you, such as numbers, elements, locations, etc.} Y{You learn of the location of magic in the area} | R{You learn if there are arcane sources in the vicinity}.

talents.name: Emotional insight
talents.effects: When trying to determine lies you also gain a single word as to why the person you are talking to might lie, such as love, revenge, family, etc..

talents.name: Spot weakness
talents.effects: Roll an insight check to reveal a characters weakness: G{You also learn how to best exploit it}.

talents.name: Torturer
talents.effects: When questioning a prisoner, choose a number between 1 and 10 and roll 1d10 for the prisoner. The higher the number, the more information you will gain, but if the roll is lower than your number, the prisoner falls unconscious, takes lasting damage or dies.

talents.name: Copycat
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to mimic any sound you heard before: the sound is  G{indistinguishable} | Y{hard to distinguish} | R{suspicious but convincing}

talents.name: Impressive
talents.effects: When you succeed on a performance check, choose one witness to impress and gain +1 die for any check that targets the witness until you leave the area.

talents.name: Infectious laughter
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to make your audience laugh G{so hard, they fall to the ground laughing}.

talents.name: Detective
talents.effects: Whenever you enter a room you have not been in yet, you gain information about one unusual thing that stands out, if there are any.

talents.name: False thoughts
talents.effects: You can present false thoughts whenever your mind is being read.

talents.name: Iron will
talents.effects: When you are the target of mind effects you can instead take a lvl 1 wound and ignore the effect.

talents.name: Living compass
talents.effects: You always know the cardinal directions and the way you have traveled.

talents.name: Telepath
talents.effects: You can telepathically communicate with creatures in your vicinity.

talents.name: Unerring eyes
talents.effects: Gain the following boon: illusions. On checks against illusions: G{ask the GM a question about the nature of the illusion}.

talents.name: Universal translator
talents.effects: You can understand every language but do not speak or write it.

talents.name: Eye for loot
talents.effects: When inspecting an item, roll a lore check to ask the GM G{3} | Y{2} | R{1} questions about the item.

talents.name: Size up foes
talents.effects: Analyze a creature and gain information about one of the following things: strength, wealth, intelligence, relationship to you, etc.

talents.name: Battle medic
talents.effects: Heal a creatures newest wound.

talents.name: Feldsher
talents.effects: Heal a lvl 1 wound. This takes some time.

talents.name: Fortifying treatment
talents.effects: Choose an ally during a rest, they gain +1 armor for the next day.

talents.name: Surgeon
talents.effects: Roll a crafting check to heal the severely wounded: G{Remove a wound of any lvl} | Y{Heal a lvl 1 wound} | R{Inflict a lvl 1 wound}

talents.name: Looking for rarities
talents.effects: Roll a vigilance check to search the market for a specific item: You find G{an exact version} | Y{a lesser version} of the item.

talents.name: Sharp senses
talents.effects: Gain the following boons: smelling, hearing, tasting.

talents.name: Chosen prey
talents.effects: Choose a creature type or specific creature during rest. You gain +1 for all checks relating to or against that creature.

talents.name: Handy pocket
talents.effects: As long as you have a free hand, you can keep a small item in it at all times unseen.

talents.name: Pack mule
talents.effects: You can carry a lot more weight, without being weighed down.

talents.name: Sticky feet
talents.effects: You stick to walls and ceilings.

talents.name: Swashbuckle
talents.effects: Gain the following boons: acrobatics, daring actions.

talents.name: Gotta go fast
talents.effects: Gain the following boon: speed. Gain the following flaw: accuracy

talents.name: Parkour
talents.effects: You can skip checks relating to climbing unless they are especially dangerous or hard.

talents.name: Armor damper
talents.effects: You ignore any flaws from wearing armor.

talents.name: Group stealth
talents.effects: Your allies can choose to use the result of your trickery checks for stealth and hiding when you move as a group.

talents.name: Lockpicking savant
talents.effects: Roll a trickery check to pick a lock: G{open the lock} | G{open the lock quickly but lose the lockpick} | Y{open the lock, but lose the lockpick} | R{open the lock, but leave marks} | R{open the lock slowly}.

talents.name: Must be the wind
talents.effects: When you are spotted while sneaking or hiding, roll 1d6 and add it to your original check result.

talents.name: Shadow stalker
talents.effects: Gain the following boon: shadows x2.

talents.name: Shadow ninja
talents.effects: You can treat any trickery check made from within shadows as green.

talents.name: Camouflage
talents.effects: You may use endurance instead of trickery for hiding. If you take your time, you can create a hideout that lets you skip the checks altogether.

talents.name: Expert tracker
talents.effects: When you roll checks to track a creature: G{gain knowledge of the specific creature from the GM}.

talents.name: Tracking mark
talents.effects: Mark a creature. You can follow a thin trail to the marked creature at all times. Only one creature can be marked this way at a time.

talents.name: Trapper
talents.effects: Setting up traps takes you only a short time and most animals will not be able to find your traps.

talents.name: Alchemy
talents.effects: You can learn and create alchemy formulas. You can create alchemical ingredients by spending 1 resolve during rest to create 5 crafting ingredients.

talents.name: Bomber
talents.effects: Gain the following boon: explosives. You learn the following alchemy formula: basic bomb. Once per rest you can create a basic bomb without spending ingredients.

talents.name: Purest form
talents.effects: Choose an alchemy formula. You learn the chosen formula by heart and can craft it once per rest without rolling a check or spending ingredients.

talents.name: Quick alchemy
talents.effects: Instead of taking your time, you can create alchemy formulas as an action and during stressful situations.

talents.name: Brewer
talents.effects: You can learn and create brewing recipes. You can gather ingredients by spending half a day and rolling 1d8. You gain the number rolled as ingredients.

talents.name: Infusion
talents.effects: Choose a brewer recipe to infuse your body with. You become immune to the effects and your body produces small amounts of it over time.

talents.name: Moonshiner
talents.effects: Gain the following boon: distilling, creating drugs. Once per rest you can create a jug of strong alchohol without spending ingredients.

talents.name: Overload
talents.effects: When crafting potions and other brewer recipes, you can combine 2 recipes into one potion or poison.

talents.name: Spell absorption
talents.effects: When you are hit by a spell or an arcane effect, you can spend 5 ingredients to bottle a copy of the effect as a potion. When using the potion, roll a crafting check: R:{It explodes with the bottled effect.}

talents.name: Splash potions
talents.effects: When you create a brewing recipe, you can spend 1 more ingredient to make the potion or poison throwable, working its effect wherever it lands.

talents.name: Mutationist
talents.effects: You can learn and create mutation genecasts. Harvest creatures to gain some of their genetic material used in the creation of mutations. Destroy a corpse and gain 1/2/3/4/5 special ingredients based on its size.

talents.name: Stable concoctions
talents.effects: You stabilize your mutations to inject them into others.

talents.name: Stitched together
talents.effects: You can activate up to 3 mutations at the same time in the same body.

talents.name: Swift extraction
talents.effects: When you damage a creature you can make a crafting check to G{harvest 2 special ingredients} | Y{harvest 1 special ingredient}.

talents.name: Craftology
talents.effects: Roll a crafting check. You can use it in place of any other check until your next rest.

talents.name: Honed nose
talents.effects: You can roll a crafting check to identify food and drink: You gain information about G{poisons, drugs etc.} | Y{tampering}.

talents.name: Night owl
talents.effects: You can choose to gain +1 resolve during a rest. If you do, you do not remove stress and fatigue.

talents.name: Apotheosis
talents.effects: Gain a permanent feature based on your chosen god and a talent fitting for that feature. Talk with your GM to work out the details.

talents.name: Cleanse
talents.effects: Spend a number of resolve to clear an influence from a target. Roll an insight check with boons equal to the number of resolve spent: G{You clear the influence} | Y{You stop the influence temporarily} | R{You transfer the influence to you}.

talents.name: Play with fate
talents.effects: Reroll any check and choose which result to use. However, fate will catch up to you, the GM can add conflict to any check you make until your next rest.

talents.name: Dreamer
talents.effects: You can enter a sleeping creatures dreams and interact with them or even try to manipulate them.

talents.name: Enter mind
talents.effects: You open up your mind to enter a creatures thoughts. Roll an insight check with a flaw for each creature near your target: You read G{thoughts clearly} | Y{unclear and distorted thoughts} | R{thoughts but alert the target}.

talents.name: Firespeaker
talents.prerequisites: An Ambition relating to emotions or fire
talents.effects: Look into a fire and receive a foretelling of the future.

talents.name: Intervention TODO
talents.effects: Ask your god for help. They will help you, but you have to roll 1d20 to regain use of this talent with G{an easy task} | Y{a moderate mission} | R{a difficult quest}.

talents.name: Lay on hands
talents.effects: Spend a number of resolve to use them on other creatures. They gain the number of resolve. Alternatively you can remove a sickness or disease per resolve spent.

talents.name: Lucky roll
talents.effects: Reroll 1 check, you must use the new result.

talents.name: Delay fate
talents.effects: Ignore the conflict of any check. The next time you gain conflict, it is stronger.

talents.name: Offer for guidance
talents.effects: Based on your offering roll between 1d6 and 5d6. You receive G{a clear vision of your next steps} | Y{a vague vision of an event} | R{a shrouded vision of a calamity}.

talents.name: Bargain fate
talents.effects: You can choose to roll a check with 1d20 instead of the normal dice. Boons and flaws do not apply.

talents.name: Quick prayer
talents.effects: Gain +1 to your next check that is made with the attribute most associated with your ambition or god.

talents.name: Reflection
talents.costs: You gain -2 resolve during your next rest.
talents.effects: Roll an insight check and ask any G{2} | Y{1} questions about things you experienced during the last day.

talents.name: Scrying
talents.effects: Consume an anchor, a piece from or an object of a creature and roll an insight check: You may do the following: G{Ask 2 questions about the target} | G{Watch the target from afar} | Y{Ask 1 question about the target} | R{The target notices you}

talents.name: Spirit communion
talents.effects: Roll an insight check to speak with a spirit or ghost: You G{speak with a cooperative spirit} | Y{speak with an uncooperative spirit} | R{anger the spirit}

talents.name: Weave reality
talents.effects: You can make cumulative checks to weave a fantastical tale. Spend 1 resolve to make one check. There is no limit to the number of checks you can make, but if you gain 3 failures, your progress is reset. The more successes you accumulate, the more real your story becomes.

talents.name: Antibodies
talents.effects: Reduce the effects of poisons and gain the following boon: withstanding poisons.

talents.name: Connoisseur
talents.effects: When ingesting food, drink, potions and poisons, roll 1d4: On a 1 receive no effect from it, on a 4 double the effects.

talents.name: Early bird
talents.effects: You ignore an instance of fatigue.

talents.name: Poison immunity
talents.effects: You become immune to all poisons.

talents.name: Hard noggin
talents.effects: You are immune to the negative effects of being drunk.

talents.name: Drunkards armor
talents.effects: Whenever you become drunk, gain 2 armor that last until it is used or you sober up.

talents.name: Shrug it off
talents.effects: When you gain a status effect you can choose to attack the nearest target with a skirmish check: G{End the effect} | Y{Suspend the effect until after your next action}.

talents.name: Animal companion
talents.prerequisites: At least +3 in either endurance or influence
talents.effects: Gain a small or medium animal as your companion. Your companion can move and act independently from you and has 2 - 0 - 0 health.

talents.name: Monster companion
talents.effects: Your companion can be any creature.

talents.name: Beastmaster
talents.effects: You are able to control stronger companions and functions as a separate character. They gain the following attributes: ST, DE and WE. Distribute 6 points between them. They also gain the following skills: agility, trickery, endurance, vigilance, performance, skirmish. Distribute 6 points between them like you would when creating a character. They gain 2 - 2 - 1 wounds.

talents.name: Special training
talents.effects: You can train your companion in more complex moves and abilities. Choose up to 4 moves from the companion moves list to train your companion in.

talents.name: Animal speech
talents.effects: You gain the ability to talk to animals.

talents.name: Shared consciousness
talents.effects: You can take control of your companion and see, feel and hear thorugh them while your body enters a trance like state of vulnerability.

talents.name: Magical conduit
talents.prerequisites: Animal companion, any talent that allows the casting of spells
talents.effects: You can use your companion as origin of your spell effects.

talents.name: Hamster cheeks
talents.effects: You can store up to 5 small items in your mouth.

talents.name: Copy cat
talents.effects: You can change your looks to that of another person, excluding their clothes.

talents.name: Shapeshift
talents.effects: You can shapeshift into small creatures of a chosen type: animal, plant, dragon, anomaly, elemental, fey, demon.

talents.name: Shapeshift 2
talents.effects: You can shapeshift into medium or large creatures of your chosen type.

talents.name: Shapeshift 3
talents.effects: You can shapeshift into huge creatures of your chosen type.

talents.name: Electrical conduit
talents.effects: You can choose to attract lightning and electricity in the vicinity and direct it to yourself. Doing so allows you to recharge a charge of any talent, but you will gain conflict.

talents.name: Running hot
talents.effects: While you are burning, you move with incredible speed and strength. Gain a temporary boon: agility x3.

talents.name: Ward of protection
talents.effects: When you learn this talent, choose a trinket or small item to imbue. When you are in danger, you can activate the trinket to skip a check. This does not count as success, conflict or failure, the action simply never happens.

talents.name: Bound item
talents.effects: When you learn this talent choose an item in your posession: You can telepathically move and materialise/dematerialise it. You can perform a ritual to bind another item, releasing the first.

talents.name: Lullaby
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to sing a lullaby: G{Everyone that hears you falls asleep} | Y{Everyone that hears you becomes tired and sleepy} | R{You fall asleep}

talents.name: WHAT?
talents.effects: You can choose to ignore any sound or sonic effects and filter only those you want to hear.

talents.name: Illusory double
talents.effects: You can create an illusory double that copies your movement and lasts a medium duration.

talents.name: Illusory clone
talents.effects: Your double can follow commands and act independently from you.

talents.name: Arcane armor
talents.effects: When you spend resolve to reduce conflict of arcane nature, reduce it again, as if you would spend another resolve.

talents.name: Spectral hand
talents.effects: Summon a magical hand for a medium duration.

talents.name: Permanent spectral hand
talents.effects: Your spectral hand becomes permanent. You can use charges from your spectral hand talent to summon additional hands for a medium duration.

talents.name: Invisibility
talents.effects: You and all that is on you when you use this talent turns invisible for a short duration.

talents.name: Fog control
talents.effects: You can create and manipulate a small fog cloud.

talents.name: Flashback
talents.effects: You travel back a short distance in time.

talents.name: Blink
talents.effects: You teleport to a visible location in medium range. Alternatively you can spend 2 charges to teleport to a location you know, but can not see. Does not work while restricted or grappled.

talents.name: Unshackled
talents.effects: You are slippery and can not be easily bound. Actions that require you to not be restricted or grappled, can still be executed by rolling a successful agility check.

talents.name: Sign of the maiden
talents.effects: Touch a creature to remove a lvl 1 wound from it.

talents.name: Sign of the archer
talents.effects: Roll a skirmish check to shoot G{4} | Y{2} | R{1} arrows.

talents.name: Sign of the betrayer
talents.effects: Touch a creature an roll a trickery check to inflict them with a poison: G{until it is treated} | Y{that is weaker} | Y{for a medium duration}. The poison will slowly eat away at the creatures strength, making them weaker until they fall unconscious.

talents.name: Sign of the king
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to inspire your allies: They gain G{boons x2 on their next 2 checks} | Y{a boon on their next check}.

talents.name: Sign of the claw
talents.effects: Roll an agility check to grapple or restrict a medium or smaller creature within medium range of you: G{Until you release it} | Y{For as long as you actively hold the effect} | Y{For a short time}

talents.name: Sign of the clone
talents.effects: Roll a trickery check to create a small illusion: G{The illusion will fool everyone at least once} | Y{The illusion will fool stupid creatures}.

talents.name: Sign of the ram
talents.effects: Roll 2d6 and knock back a target a number of meters based on the results.

talents.name: Shimmering sphere
talents.effects: Create a small sphere around you. Everyone inside of the sphere is camouflaged and while standing absolutely still, invisible even.

talents.name: Sign of the sea
talents.effects: Roll an endurance check to allow G{3} | Y{1} creatures to breath underwater for a medium duration.

talents.name: Sign of sleep
talents.costs: You gain no resolve during your next 2 rests.
talents.effects: Roll a vigilance check to distribute G{4} | Y{2} resolve between your allies. These can exceed their resolve maximum.

talents.name: Sign of the goat
talents.effects: Summon a small, otherworldly goat. It disappears after you rest.

talents.name: Heatvision
talents.effects: You gain the ability to see heat emanating from living creatures.

talents.name: Nekromancy
talents.effects: You may inflict a lvl 1 wound on yourself to instantly recover arcane threads equal to your arcane skill.

talents.name: Life drain
talents.effects: Whenever you inflict pain or damage on another creature, you may roll 1d4 and recover that many arcane threads instantly.

talents.name: Cursed soul
talents.effects: While you are cursed or wretched, gain +1 resolve each rest.

talents.name: Voodoo
talents.costs: 3 arcane threads, a voodoo puppet, a piece of a creature
talents.effects: You gain the ability to curse creatures by building small puppets made from materials of their body. You can use these puppets to indirectly control and manipulate the targets.

talents.name: Reanimation
talents.prerequisites: Life element, creation form, exploration form
talents.effects: Contact a soul in Limbo and start a resurrection ritual. The character you want to revive can not be dead for longer than an hour.

talents.name: Resurrection
talents.prerequisites: Life element, creation form, exploration form
talents.effects: Contact a soul in Limbo and start a resurrection ritual.

talents.name: Aspect of the flame
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for fire, emotion or similar
talents.effects: Looking into a flame allows you to see brief visions of the past from the flames point of view.

talents.name: Aspect of the storm
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for power, strength, air or similar
talents.effects: You are able to sense and feel storms approaching and gain information about their duration and strength.

talents.name: Aspect of stone
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for creation, stability or similar
talents.effects: Touch a stone surface and gain information about ore veins, mineshafts, waterways etc. in the vicinity.

talents.name: Aspect of the moon
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for night, serenity, quiet or similar
talents.effects: You can wake up at will and your sleep can not be interrupted by others unless you wish so.

talents.name: Aspect of limbo
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for balance, life, death or similar
talents.effects: You can sense the veil between life and death, feeling locations where limbo is especially near.

talents.name: Aspect of the sun
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for light, hope or similar
talents.effects: You are immune to fatigue while in direct sunlight.

talents.name: Aspect of harvest
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for community, food or similar
talents.effects: Food in your possession rots much slower. When gathering or farming, gain double the amount.

talents.name: Aspect of the wilds
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for freedom, serenity or similar
talents.effects: Wildlife does not perceive you as a threat until you take provoking actions.

talents.name: Aspect of learning
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for enlightenment, knowledge or similar
talents.effects: You can read extremely fast and still recall all that you read.

talents.name: Aspect of skins
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for change, beauty, deception or similar
talents.effects: You can change your skintone and texture at will, allowing for different colours, fur, feathers or scales.

talents.name: Aspect of unwavering
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for honor, strength, justice or similar
talents.effects: You are immune to effects from fear.

talents.name: Aspect of investigation
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for justice, honor, truth or similar
talents.effects: Looking at a person reveals their most recent crime.

talents.name: Aspect of flowers
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for beauty, serenity, nature or similar
talents.effects: You always smell faintly of flowers without it being overpowering.

talents.name: Aspect of the crow
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for corruption, nature, power or similar
talents.effects: You can communicate simple ideas and requests with crows in your vicinity.

talents.name: Aspect of blood
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for healing, grief or similar
talents.effects: Taste a drop of blood to learn of the creature it came from.

talents.name: Aspect of lies
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for deception, corruption, power or similar
talents.effects: When you successfully lie to another person, also gain insight into their insecurities and fears.

talents.name: Aspect of the killer
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for war, strength, power or similar
talents.effects: After killing an enemy, gain 1d4 to add to any checks result. You can only have one of these d4 at a time.

talents.name: Aspect of remembrance
talents.prerequisites: An ambition for memory, history, enlightenment or similar
talents.effects: You have a photographic memory and can recall all that has happened in the last month in detail.

talents.name: Wound redistribution
talents.effects: When you would fill a wound of a higher level, you can instead fill wounds of a lower level equal to its lvl.

talents.name: Satür
talents.effects: You can choose to make the tear you create with your tearhopping talent accessible for others as well.

talents.name: Goldfinger
talents.effects: You have a sense for gold, gold and only gold. You can see and feel every presence of gold in an area of 20 meters around you, but your sight becomes clouded. Gain a flaw: vigilance.

talents.name: Elemental resistance
talents.effects: Choose an element when learning this talent. Gain the following boon: resistance against chosen element

talents.name: Arcane combination
talents.effects: You can combine two or more talents that fit for a given spell effect. Doing so costs arcane threads for each element seperately.

talents.name: Versatility
talents.effects: Choose any talent (that you fulfill the prerequisites for) to learn.

talents.name: Rapid adaptability
talents.effects: Whenever you rest, you may increase a skill by 1 and decrease another skill by 1.

talents.name: Unwavering mind
talents.effects: Ignore the first time you would gain stress after each rest.

talents.name: Sleepless
talents.effects: You are unable to sleep and immune against negative effects gained from not sleeping or being exhausted. You still recover as normal at sunrise.

talents.name: Darkvision
talents.effects: You are able to see even in complete darkness, but only in grayscale.

talents.name: Rock eater
talents.effects: You are able to eat rocks, crystals and other minerals. Gain an effect based on the type of mineral: magnetic, extra heavy, jagged, camouflaged, luminous.

talents.name: Image of Orvos
talents.effects: You resemble the image of a fallen god, instilling a primal reaction in all those that see you. The first time you interact meaningfully with a creature, roll 1d6. On 4-6 gain a boon on them, as they trust you more, on a 1-3 gain a flaw instead, as they mistrust and maybe fear you.

talents.name: Share emotions
talents.effects: You can share emotions. Target a creature and choose which emotion to impart on them.

talents.name: Small frame
talents.effects: Your body is small and nimble, gain the following boons: sneaking, hiding, dodging

talents.name: Hinans luck
talents.effects: Using resolve allows you to also use it on full successes, increasing them to critical successes.

talents.name: Resilience
talents.effects: Gain 1 permanent armor against blunt and frost damage.

talents.name: Fighting spirit
talents.effects: Whenever you enter willingly into a fight, you gain 1 resolve that can only be used during that fight.

talents.name: Limit breaker
talents.effects: You can push yourself to your limits. Gain +1 die on any physical check and a temporary flaw: exhausted until you rest.

talents.name: Regeneration
talents.effects: Heal an additional lvl 1 wound per rest.

talents.name: Gob's body
talents.effects: Gain a trait from the list: Frog: Your long and sticky tongue works as a weak third arm. Toad: Your skin secrets a numbing poison that paralyzes after 10 seconds of contact. Salamander: When healing wounds you can roll and endurance check to regrow a lost limb. Alligator: Gain the following boon: biting x2

talents.name: Gob's nature
talents.effects: You are bound by a genetic oath to your liege. Summon this oath to gain a boon x3 on any check. This talents charges do not recharge during a rest. Instead, once you used up all of them, your liege will call on you to fullfill a quest in their name. After successfully finishing the quest, all charges are restored.

talents.name: Hive bonding
talents.effects: You can only communicate telepathically with other creatures that you can see. You can also read the thoughts of other Quabut, but they can do the same to you.

talents.name: Watery body
talents.effects: Water is running through your veins instead of water. You can store up to a weeks worth of it at a time and breathe water. As long as you are full of water, your touch deals electric damage.

talents.name: Biological immunity
talents.effects: You are immune to illness and disease and can only be infected by a wretch if you choose to do so.

talents.name: Immortal soul
talents.effects: TODO

talents.name: Decaying body
talents.effects: Your body is dead and not affected by minor wounds. Ignore any lvl 1 wounds you would gain from damage. However your body is not as resilient against destruction anymore. You die by gaining a lvl 3 wound.

talents.name: Born of the veil
talents.effects: You were created by nekromantic magic and can be easily revived by the same means. Once per week you can be revived by your allies with a simple ritual.

talents.name: Thoughts for food
talents.effects: Consume a recently deceased creature to gain insight into their memories. Roll an insight check to gain memories G{dating back a few days} | Y{of just before death}.

talents.name: Unionized
talents.effects: Ignore any dangerous or harmful conflict

talents.name: Tearhopping
talents.effects: You rip open a small tear in reality, but not into the void. Instead you create a portal to the FEYWILD, that only you can enter once. While in the FEYWILD, you can enter the portal again to return to reality. The portal closes after 5 seconds (or a day in the FEYWILD).

talents.name: Light bending
talents.effects: You can turn your body invisible at will, however, everything you wear or carry will still be visible.

talents.name: Glass splinters
talents.effects: Fill a lvl 3 wound permanently to split off a piece of your body. It can act on its own an serves as your familiar until you reattach it, which heals the wound. Wounds gained by this talent, can not be removed in any other way.
